titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the provision added by the Taxpayer Relief Act of 1997 that imposes tax increases on certain families by reason of the inflation adjustments in the regular income tax rate brackets, the standard deduction, and the personal exemption.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/22/1998--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code concerning the additional credit for taxpayers with three or more children to repeal provisions which, in specified circumstances, would increase such taxpayers' taxes.
